settings.title: Connect Your Strava Account
settings.description: Start by securely linking your Strava account with a single click. We use industry-standard OAuth authentication to ensure your data stays safe and private. No password sharing required—just authorize our app and you're ready to go.
settings.features: Secure OAuth 2.0 authentication|One-click connection process|Access all your cycling activities instantly|No password sharing required|Automatic activity sync

settings.title: Select Your Favorite Activity
settings.description: Browse through your complete Strava history and choose the ride you want to turn into art. Use our powerful filters to search by distance, date, location, or activity type. Preview each route before making your selection.
settings.features: Search through all your Strava activities|Filter by date, distance, and type|View interactive route previews|See elevation profiles and stats|Select multiple activities (coming soon)

settings.title: Customize Your Map Design
settings.description: This is where the magic happens. Our intuitive 4-tab customization interface lets you perfect every detail. Choose your map style, pick your route colors, add custom text, and select your print size. Our live preview updates in real-time so you see exactly what your final print will look like.
settings.features: Tab 1 - Style: Choose from 20+ professional map themes|Tab 2 - Colors: Select route colors from curated palettes|Tab 3 - Text: Add custom titles, subtitles, and adjust route line width (1-10px)|Tab 4 - Size: Select print format (A4, A3, A2) and orientation|Real-time preview with every change|Interactive map customization with zoom and pan

settings.title: Choose Format & Place Order
settings.description: Select your preferred print size (A4, A3, or A2) and optional professional framing. All prints are produced at museum-quality 300 DPI resolution on premium archival paper. Add to cart and we'll handle the rest with fast, secure shipping worldwide.
settings.features: Multiple print sizes available|Professional framing options|300 DPI museum-quality printing|Premium archival paper|Fast worldwide shipping|30-day satisfaction guarantee

settings.style_description: Clean, timeless design with bold route lines and minimal distractions. Perfect for any interior style.

settings.choices: Ride title|Date & time|Location|Custom message|Stats display|Font selection|Text size|Positioning|Color customization

settings.choices: A4 (8.3 × 11.7 in)|A3 (11.7 × 16.5 in)|A2 (16.5 × 23.4 in)|300 DPI quality|Archival paper

settings.description: Upgrade to a professionally crafted wooden or metal frame. Each frame is handcrafted with UV-protective glass and ready to hang.
settings.choices: Unframed (print only)|Black wood frame|White wood frame|Natural oak frame|Walnut wood frame|Premium metal frame

settings.description: Fine-tune your map's composition. Adjust zoom level, rotation, and framing to capture the perfect view of your route.
settings.choices: Auto-fit route|Custom zoom level|Map rotation|Center point adjustment|Margin control|Aspect ratio options

settings.description: Control the appearance of your route line with precision. Adjust thickness (1-10px) and choose from multiple color options including red, black, white, and blue.
settings.choices: Line thickness slider (1-10px)|Route color palette (Red, Black, White, Blue)|Custom route colors|Line style options|Real-time preview|Perfect for any print size

settings.heading: How to Build Your Custom Map
settings.description: From Strava to stunning wall art in 4 simple steps. Discover how to transform your cycling adventures into museum-quality prints that celebrate your achievements.
settings.styles_description: Every map tells a story. Pick the style that brings your adventure to life and complements your space perfectly.
settings.options_description: Make it uniquely yours with our extensive customization options. From colors to stats, you're in complete control.
settings.cta_description: Transform your favorite rides into stunning wall art in minutes. No design skills required.
settings.trust_badges: Free Worldwide Shipping|300 DPI Museum Quality|30-Day Money-Back Guarantee|Secure Payment

settings.heading: Get Inspired by Real Rider Maps
settings.description: See what's possible with custom map posters. Each one tells a unique story of adventure and achievement.

settings.heading: How does the Strava integration work?
settings.row_content: We use secure OAuth 2.0 authentication to connect with your Strava account. This means you never share your password with us. Once connected, we can access your public activity data to generate your custom maps. You can disconnect at any time from your account settings.

settings.heading: What print quality can I expect?
settings.row_content: All our prints are produced at professional 300 DPI resolution on museum-grade archival paper. This ensures sharp details, vibrant colors, and longevity. The paper is acid-free and designed to last for generations without fading.

settings.heading: Can I customize the map colors and style?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! You have complete control over your map's appearance. Choose from 20+ pre-designed styles or create your own color scheme. You can also customize text, fonts, stats display, zoom level, and much more. Our live preview shows your changes in real-time.

settings.heading: What sizes are available?
settings.row_content:
We offer three standard sizes:
• A4 (8.3 × 11.7 inches / 210 × 297 mm)
• A3 (11.7 × 16.5 inches / 297 × 420 mm)
• A2 (16.5 × 23.4 inches / 420 × 594 mm)

All sizes are available with or without professional framing options.

settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content:
Production typically takes 2-3 business days. Shipping times vary by location:
• US: 3-5 business days
• Europe: 5-7 business days
• Rest of world: 7-14 business days

We offer free standard shipping worldwide. Express options are available at checkout.

settings.heading: What if I'm not satisfied with my print?
settings.row_content: We stand behind our quality with a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your print, contact us within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or replacement. We'll even cover return shipping.

settings.heading: Can I create maps from non-Strava activities?
settings.row_content: Currently, we support Strava integration exclusively. However, if you have GPS data from other sources (Garmin, Wahoo, etc.), you can upload those files to Strava first, then create your map through our platform.

settings.heading: Do you offer gift certificates?
settings.row_content: Yes! Gift certificates are available in multiple denominations. They make perfect gifts for cyclists and can be redeemed for any product in our store. Purchase a gift certificate from our shop page.
